question:
Prime Minister is chairperson of:
  1. National Crisis Management Committee (NCMC)
  2. National Disaster Management Authority (NDMA)
  3. National Committee on Trade Facilitation (NCTF)
   Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: National Crisis Management Committee (NCMC) headed by the Cabinet Secretary. The Prime Minister is the ex-officio chairperson of NDMA. National Committee on Trade Facilitation (NCTF) is again headed by the Cabinet Secretary.
